title.rendered: Wrangler NFBR 2020 live stream: How to watch online

content.rendered:
Watch the action at the Wrangler NFBR! The 2020 Wrangler® National Finals Breakaway Roping (NFBR) will be held on Tuesday, December 8 – Thursday, December 10 in Globe Life Field, Arlington, TX. Where the Cowgirls competing for this first world championship in this 3 days events! The Wrangler NFBR will be a separate ticketed event from the Wrangler NFR. and a $200,000 purse at this three-day event.

Wrangler® National Finals Breakaway Roping (NFBR)
Venue Globe Life Field, Arlington, TX
Starting Date Tuesday, December 8, 2020
End Date Thursday, December 10, 2020
Broadcast Wrangler Network
Live Stream Watch Here

Breakaway roping is one of the hottest events sanctioned by the Women’s Professional Rodeo Association (WPRA), and the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA) is proud to share the venue with some of the best cowgirls in rodeo for this event. The PRCA and the WPRA have been working together for the last year to promote breakaway roping and grow the sport.

2020 NFBR Competitors
Rank Name Hometown Earnings
1 Cassie Latham Grantsville, UT $26,524
2 Jackie Crawford Stephenville, TX $21,649
3 Martha Angelone Stephenville, TX $15,918
4 Jordan Fabrizio Canyon, TX $14,377
5 Katie Mundorf (R) Mullen, NE $12,297
6 Lari Dee Guy Abilene, TX $12,109
7 Shelby Boisjoli (R) Stephenville, TX $11,946
8 Tanegai Zilverberg Holabrid, SD $11,266
9 Amanda Coleman Stephenville, TX $10,977
10 Macy Fuller Wittmann, AZ $10,905
11 Anna Bahe Grantsville, TX $10,529
12 Kirby Eppert Seneca, NE $10,248
13 Hope Thompson Abilene, TX $10,245
14 JJ Hampton Stephenville, TX $10,231
15 Erin Johnson Fowler, CO $9,277

How to watch Wrangler NFBR live streaming?

For fans who are unable to attend the Wrangler NFBR at Globe Life Field in December, the three performances will be live streamed on the Wrangler Network (www.wranglernetwork.com) and will be rebroadcast at a later date on The Cowboy Channel.

How to get National Finals Breakaway Roping tickets?

Public on-sale date is Friday, Nov. 6 at 10 a.m. CT.  I intended http://www.texasrangers.com/NFR to purchase tickets. Not sure which parks to visit in Globe Life Field, Check out A quick guide to Wrangler National Finals Rodeo Dec. 3-12, 2020.

Don’t miss this inaugural event!

  • Biggest payout for Breakaway Ropers in a WPRA sanctioned event
  • Crowns World Champion – first ever!
  • Watch the best women ropers in the world compete for the world champion gold buckle
  • One-of-kind experience at Globe Life Field
